name: Enerfair Engagement Ltd
legal: Private Limited Company registered in England
goal: Enerfair Engagement Ltd offers strategic communications and policy support services to organisations working to tackle climate change, reduce carbon dioxide emissions and transition towards a net zero emissions economy.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Enerfair Engagement Ltd is currently working on aspects of the Clean Energy Package, the EU Long Term Emissions Reduction Strategy, the ETS Innovation Fund and the Clean Mobility Package.
customers: Bellona Europa,University of Cambridge Institute for Sustainability Leadership
